full_summary:
# Security Awareness Solution (SaaS and Professional Services)
## Request for Proposal - Request for Quote
### Tender Number: 100019420
### Publication Date: May 10, 2023
### Closing Date: June 19, 2023, 2:00 p.m. (Local time)

**Objective:**
The Cybersecurity Awareness and Training Team (CATT) of Employment and Social Development Canada (ESDC) invites qualified Service Providers to respond to this Request for Proposal (RFP) for a Cloud-based Security Awareness Solution.

**Solution Requirements:**
The solution must include:

*   A Software as a Service (SaaS) Training e-learning software library
*   A phishing simulation engine to conduct in-house training and simulations
*   Professional services on an "as and when requested" basis for up to five (5) years
*   Development and deployment of a bilingual security awareness training program for all ESDC employees
*   Access to a bilingual training content library

**Key Features:**

*   Cloud-based software solution
*   Training e-learning software library
*   Phishing simulation engine
*   Bilingual training content library
*   Professional services for content development and deployment
*   Bilingual training program for ESDC employees

**Trade Agreements:**
This tender is subject to the following trade agreements:

*   Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
*   Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
*   Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
*   Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
*   World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
*   Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
*   Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
*   Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
*   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Tender Documents:**

You can find the tender documents at the following URL:

<https://canadabuys.canada.ca>

Please note that the tender is now closed.  Answer Choice E  is not available.

Ref: Estelle, NC-Solicitations-GD@HRSDC-RHDC, 12345.
